Each share of Class A Common Stock was issued upon the conversion of one share of Class B Common Stock at the election of Reporting Person. The price reported in Column 4 is a weighted average price. These shares were sold in multiple transactions at prices ranging from $744.55 to $745.54, inclusive. The reporting person undertakes to provide to any security holder of Alphabet Inc. or the staff of the Securities and Exchange Commission, upon request, full information regarding the number of shares sold at each separate price within the ranges set forth in footnotes (2) through (25) to this Form 4.
